title: Pakistan’s envoy briefs PM on preparations for UNGA session
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 1 (APP): Pakistan’s Permanent Representative to the United Nations Munir Akram on Friday called on Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar.
The envoy apprised the prime minister of the preparations for the upcoming 78th session of the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA78).
The prime minister appreciated Munir Akram for effective representative of Pakistan on the UN platform.
